mapper.insert: insert into xhgmnet_operations_fault_task_order(bsid, bsname, dispatchtime, dispatchman, errtype, errlevel, errfoundtime, errslovetime, progress, proresult, workman, auditor,serialnumber, userid)values(#{bsid}, #{bsname}, #{dispatchtime},#{dispatchman}, #{errtype},#{errlevel}, #{errfoundtime},#{errslovetime},#{progress},#{proresult},#{workman},#{auditor},#{serialnumber},#{userid})
mapper.select: select a.userId,a.user,a.userName,b.role from xhgmnet_web_user as a left join (select x.userId,x.roleId,y.role from xhgmnet_web_role_user as x left join xhgmnet_web_role as y on x.roleId=y.roleId) as b on a.userId=b.userId where a.userId in(select userId from xhgmnet_web_role_user where roleId in(select roleId from xhgmnet_web_role where roleType=3 and roleId!=10003)) order by user asc
